snippet: Andrew Edlin Gallery has an exhibition of the ferocious anti-Nazi posters produced in the Soviet Union during World War II.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews exhibition of Soviet propaganda posters from World War II at Andrew Edlin Gallery.
lead_paragraph: Andrew Edlin Gallery has an exhibition of the ferocious anti-Nazi posters produced in the Soviet Union during World War II.

headline.seo: ‘DIE, NAZI SCUM!’: Soviet Tass Propaganda Posters, 1941-1945
headline.main: ‘Die, Nazi Scum!’: Soviet Tass Propaganda Posters, 1941-1945
headline.print_headline: ‘Die, Nazi Scum!’: Soviet Tass Propaganda Posters, 1941-1945
